Articles.Content:
Ok so i ran ksp and i got a an error related to Realism Over Haul's "global cfg file" (located at GameData\RealismOverhaul\RealismOverhaul_Global_Config.cfg) please help!!!!

Mod list via ckan: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B2GM9RzbBEuZVXZzUTNXMmtrWDg/view?usp=sharing

Error log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B2GM9RzbBEuZdmlsaXhBZWZvZnM/view?usp=sharing

Odd, You have ALOT of mods so I bet there was a glitch somewhere. I suggest an uninstall of Realism Overhaul and all its asset mods. Try installing just Realism Overhaul without some of the other stuff. If it doesn't work there is a problem with RO itself. Also, try a revert to 1.2.2. Then download RO. You also have a lot of upgraded graphics mods, they may conflict. Hopefully this helps!

Edited July 24, 2017 by AlienFromTrappist-1

46 minutes ago, AlienFromTrappist-1 said:

Odd, You have ALOT of mods so I bet there was a glitch somewhere. I suggest an uninstall of Realism Overhaul and all its asset mods. Try installing just Realism Overhaul without some of the other stuff. If it doesn't work there is a problem with RO itself. Also, try a revert to 1.2.2. Then download RO. You also have a lot of upgraded graphics mods, they may conflict. Hopefully this helps!

I am on 1.2.2, and I tried what you said and it worked! But I would like to know what the problem was, do you know? (ckan didnt report any conflicts)

I did not see anything regarding RO but:

  • you had at least three mods (000_AT_Utils, Hangar, ShowFPS) that were throwing NullReffs upon loading (outdated? not installed correctly?)
  • you had SimpleBoiloff installed (conficts with the boiloff from RealFuels)

8 hours ago, Phineas Freak said:

I did not see anything regarding RO but:

  • you had at least three mods (000_AT_Utils, Hangar, ShowFPS) that were throwing NullReffs upon loading (outdated? not installed correctly?)
  • you had SimpleBoiloff installed (conficts with the boiloff from RealFuels)

I dont have SimpleBoiloff installed. But i did uninstall 000_AT_Utils, Hangar, ShowFPS and I got this

log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B2GM9RzbBEuZcmR3dlFUaUNfYkE/view?usp=sharing

mod list: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B2GM9RzbBEuZeDYxRl9BSDlWRTQ/view?usp=sharing
